<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create new Decoded Pix Account ID.</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/pix/payment/decode/by-account"}></MethodEndpoint>



To create a new pix payment by a bank account, first you need to create a Decoded Pix Account ID. Enter the bank account's information on the requisition body below and execute to get its ID. This ID is the decoded_pix_account_id which will be required to create a pix payment by a bank account.

## Request

All objects must have an identifier.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"nonce","in":"header","description":"The nonce ID is a UUID (v4) used to uniquely identify the requisition.
